title: Between 1 July 2017 and 30 June 2018, will an armed group from Burundi engage in a campaign that systematically kills 1,000 or more civilians in Burundi?
preds: Based on general news and GJP consensus.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.

Repatriations and rebel group announcement
(https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-08-29/rebel-group-vows-to-step-up-attacks-against-burundi-s-government)
may destabilize the situation.
Based on general news and GJP consensus.

The current climate of Burundi politics seems to be reaching a danger zone.  The national army is beginning to divide among ethnic lines.  Multiple coup attempts have taken place in the near past.  Genocide was a part of their recent history when then Hulu massacred the Tutsi.  Most of the countries bordering Burundi are unstable, as well.  Of the top 15 countries at risk for genocide, Burundi is close to the top in my opinion.
This country is not out of the woods yet
